hero.title: TinyTalks
hero.subtitle: small steps to big English
hero.description:
I help children and adults learn English at their own pace — calmly, with support and enjoyment.

Asynchronous lessons and live classes make the process flexible, and the result — real.
hero.imageAlt: English teacher working with a student

about.title: I'm Evgenia Penkova, an English teacher and creator of TinyTalks project
about.intro1: TinyTalks grew from my desire to make learning English simple, modern, and understandable.
about.intro2:
I see how often students are afraid to "make mistakes", lose motivation, or think that "it's just not for them".

My goal is to show that this is not true.

In my classes, there is no rush or pressure — only support, a friendly atmosphere, and clear steps to results.
about.intro3:
I believe that everyone can speak English if they learn at a comfortable pace and receive feedback
that inspires, not frightens.
about.cta: TinyTalks is a place where learning is easy, pleasant, and genuine.

trial.name: Trial Lesson
trial.subtitle: Try before you start — free
trial.description:
In the trial lesson, we'll determine your level, discuss goals, and create a learning plan.

You'll understand which format suits you best.

individual.name: Individual Lesson
individual.subtitle: Full teacher attention just for you
individual.description:
Individual lessons are your personal pace and program tailored to you.

We cover grammar, discuss relevant topics, practice pronunciation, and solve the tasks that matter to you.

async.name: Asynchronous Microlearning
async.subtitle: Learn at your convenience — in small steps
async.description:
Short lessons, practical tasks, and my feedback — all at your pace.

You complete lessons when convenient and gradually build confidence without losing motivation.

Perfect for those who want to learn English flexibly.

group.name: Async + Weekly Live Lesson
group.subtitle: Learn at your own pace and lock it in live
group.duration: Async practice + 1 live session each week
group.description:
- Convenient async lessons
- One live online class per week
- Short tasks with personalized feedback

Study whenever it suits you, then use the weekly live session to ask questions, practice speaking, and boost your confidence. Perfect when you need flexibility plus regular real-time support.

reviews.title: What Our Students Say
reviews.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear from students who have transformed their English skills

anna.content: Evgenia is an amazing teacher! She helped me improve my English from beginner to B1 level in just 8 months. Her lessons are always engaging and fun. I highly recommend TinyTalks!

dmitry.content: I was always afraid to speak English, but Evgenia created such a comfortable learning environment. Now I can confidently communicate with international clients. Thank you!

maria.content: The personalized approach made all the difference. Every lesson was tailored to my needs and interests. I've never enjoyed learning a language this much!

pavel.content: After trying several English courses, I finally found TinyTalks. The one-on-one lessons helped me progress faster than I ever thought possible. Worth every penny!

elena.content: Evgenia's teaching methods are fantastic! She uses real-life situations and interesting materials. My speaking skills have improved dramatically in just 3 months.

sergei.content: Professional, patient, and always prepared. Evgenia is the best English teacher I've ever had. I went from struggling with basics to holding conversations!
